And I've got an awful lot of them - but don't know why.
Looks more like a core problem. Moving to platform.core for comment.

This is another side-effect of 48702 - jobs running after the workbench has
closed the display.  This is fixed in today's integration build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 48702 ***
